channel.title: Odd Problem
channel.description:
I feel like a noob asking this but oh well.
I'm trying to use a powerminer. Well any of 3 powerminers actually. I've got Stupid3ooo's, Solemn Wishes', and RealRune's. On all three of them whenever I run the script it will either: A. Not find the color even though I'm standing right next to the rock. (I've tried different places, ores, etc.) B. Find the colors and click but after it clicks I lag to hell and logout. C. Find the colors and randomly walk towards the Bottom Right of my screen.
I have set the colors manually and that eliminates problem A but still get problem B or C.
I've searched around and a few people seem to be having the same problem. But no one seems to have found and answer on what is causing it.
And yes, I do have the Client targetted, I have tried both SwiftSwitch and RS webpage to make it work, I have it on v-bright and 32bit color as the script reccomends.

item.title: Odd Problem
item.dc:creator: @mjordan mjordan
item.description:
@mjordan wrote:

ok well first of all stupids is out of date =( it was an awesome powerminer back in the day. and everybody is having a problem with realrunes because it is so laggy. and i dont know about solemns

Read full topic

item.title: Odd Problem
item.dc:creator: @Fishygame Fishygame
item.description:
@Fishygame wrote:

I don’t see how 3 seperate scripts could all be causing the same problems but I guess that is a possibility because I earlier used an autofighter and it worked perfectly.

Other people seem to have the scripts working fine for them. So I’m really confuzzled right now.

Read full topic

item.title: Odd Problem
item.dc:creator: @mikkomainer Secet
item.description:
@mikkomainer wrote:

Maybe the problem is in script?

Read full topic

item.title: Odd Problem
item.dc:creator: @Fishygame Fishygame
item.description:
@Fishygame wrote:

I feel like a noob asking this but oh well.

I’m trying to use a powerminer. Well any of 3 powerminers actually. I’ve got Stupid3ooo’s, Solemn Wishes’, and RealRune’s.
On all three of them whenever I run the script it will either:
A. Not find the color even though I’m standing right next to the rock. (I’ve tried different places, ores, etc.)

C. Find the colors and randomly walk towards the Bottom Right of my screen.

I have set the colors manually and that eliminates problem A but still get problem B or C.

I’ve searched around and a few people seem to be having the same problem.
But no one seems to have found and answer on what is causing it.

And yes, I do have the Client targetted, I have tried both SwiftSwitch and RS webpage to make it work, I have it on v-bright and 32bit color as the script reccomends.
